creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: indigo, light blue, off-white; short rectangular sleeves; indigo woven texture on sleeves, shoulders, upper body and collar; indigo fabric with quilted diamond stitching along lower jacket openings, waist band and along bottom; off-white band of fabric with blue diamond quilted stitching slightly below waist; large red circle outlined in white on upper back, with white-outlined indigo character inside circle; off-white woven characters on both sides of lower collar hem; off-white ribbon sewn into opening hem between characters on each side for tying jacket closed; light blue lining throughout interior
inscription: on recto: 津久田 {Tsukuda}; on verso: 有志 {yūshi} (volunteer)
title: Fireman's interior coat (hikeshi shitagi) for a volunteer
